product_name: The North Face Oso Fleece Jacket - Women's
long_description: The North Face Oso is a warm silken fleece hoodie that won't weigh you down; and looks great no matter what you're doing. High-loft, silky feeling fleece is soft and thermally efficient; nylon overlays on the shoulders help repel moisture. The North Face Oso fleece jacket features a loose-fitting hood to throw over your head when it gets chilly. Stretch binding finishes hood, cuffs and 2 zippered hand pockets. Draft flap behind front zipper and drawcord hem keep breezes from chilling you out.
short_description: The North Face Oso is a warm silken fleece hoodie that won't weigh you down; and looks great no matter what you're doing.
